DBClusterParameterGroupName.description: The name of the DB cluster parameter group. Constraints:   Must be 1 to 255 alphanumeric characters   First character must be a letter   Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens    This value is stored as a lowercase string.

DBParameterGroupFamily.description: The DB cluster parameter group family name. A DB cluster parameter group can be associated with one and only one DB cluster parameter group family, and can be applied only to a DB cluster running a database engine and engine version compatible with that DB cluster parameter group family.

Description.description: The description for the DB cluster parameter group.
